name: Euphony
description:
Find your way back home, your voice guides you. Your Voice - Your identity

Building on the idea of finding your own voice - euphony takes you through the journey of guiding yourself in these dark times with nothing just your voice, having faith in yourself and what you believe in.

Controls :

  • WASD - movement
  • Spacebar- Jump
  • Right mouse click - sing

NOTE:
if you are having trouble installing or opening the build on your mac - right-click on your mac finder and open it to be able to play it!
